channel.title: Comments on: Kaxaml a lightweight XAML editor
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: This is all well and good, but I think what XAML needs at the moment is better debugger support. Not everything is an XAMLParseException!
item.content:encoded: This is all well and good, but I think what XAML needs at the moment is better debugger support. Not everything is an XAMLParseException!
